item.description:
Spend the day in...

Newport, Rhode Island!

We'll hike the famed 3.5-mile Cliff Walk nestled between Gilded Age mansions and the rocky coast.

And we'll tour The Breakers, the largest of these opulent 19th-century homes overlooking the sea.

Beautiful Newport, Rhode Island is only a couple of hours but a world away.

There are manicured gardens, topiary sculptures, breathtaking cliffs, forts, and parks. There are also quaint shops, colorful houses, and a beautiful waterfront.

Bring your best walking shoes and an appetite for scenery and seafood. We'll spend the day exploring some gorgeous coastline, beaches, forts and views out to sea.

 

And there are Newport's numerous mansions, built by the Vanderbilts and others during the 1800s. "The Breakers" was the summer home of industrialist Cornelius Vanderbilt, and is the largest of them all. (Admission: $19.50 additional - Choice of touring the house or staying outside for a longer walk.)

And we'll find ourselves an excellent view for dinner that might look something like this at the Marina Cafe...


 

 

Dover Carpool: 7:40am. C&J bus/park & ride, Spaulding Tpk exit 9.

Newburyport Carpool:  8:15 AM. C&J Bus lot, 90 Storey Ave/Rt 113 at I-95.

Peabody Carpool: 8:35am. Dunkin Donuts - 124 Newbury St. (Route 1 south)

Share gas/toll expenses of $50 with your driver.

Newport Meeting Place: First Beach - Memorial Blvd parking area.



Liability Release

AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, snow sports, alcohol consumption, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

*Unless otherwise specified, refunds for timely cancellations will be processed the day after the event.

*Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors.  Always check email & this listing for updates before leaving home.

Click here for a note on event fees.
item.name: Cliffs and Breakers: Newport, Rhode Island!
